title: George Washington Memorial Parkway: Photos & Multimedia
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia             Photos & Multimedia       From carefully designed landscapes to inspiring public art and fascinating wildlife, a trip along the parkway is full of striking images. Check out these featured collections or browse the full list of photo galleries and multimedia presentations.         Fort Hunt Picnic Areas Five picnic areas are available by reservation. Each has a different set of facilities, which may include a pavilion, restrooms, softball diamonds, volleyball pits, and open fields.         Parkway Places The parkway was conceived as a road lined with monuments and memorials to significant people and events in American History. Here are images of these special places.         Seasons on the Parkway Each season brings dramatic change to the parkway. The landscape architects who designed it sought to show these changes at their most scenic.         Carillon Clips Each summer, guest artists play a series of concerts on the Netherlands Carillon. Recordings of summer concerts show off both the expertise of the musicians and the craftsmanship of the instrument.
